summary: This document is an email chain between Sigrid McCawley, a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a call regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails also contain a follow-up from McCawley regarding a witness's preference for an early September trial date due to a pending adoption.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Attorney corresponding with the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding scheduling and witness availability for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).

connections.description: McCawley is an attorney from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP corresponding about the Maxwell case, indicating legal representation.

events.title: Scheduling Discussion for Maxwell Case
events.description: Email exchange to schedule a call between Sigrid McCawley and an AUSA regarding the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Preferred Trial Date for Witness
events.description: A witness, represented by Sigrid McCawley, expresses a strong preference for an early September trial date due to a pending adoption with a baby due in early November.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain regarding scheduling in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
Sigrid McCawley, a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, is acting as legal counsel in the matter.
A witness represented by McCawley prefers an early September trial date due to a pending adoption, with a baby due in early November.
